author: cnbc.com
title: Seven Stars Cloud Updates Q1 Earnings Conference Call Time to 4:05 pm on Tuesday, May 15
text:
NEW YORK, May 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: SSC) ("SSC" or the "Company"), announced today that it will now host its Q1 2018 earnings conference call at the updated time of 4:05 p.m. on Tuesday, May 15, 2018, U.S. Eastern Time (4:05 a.m. on Wednesday, May 16 Beijing/Hong Kong Time), after stock market hours.
The Company's Form 10-Q as well as the accompanying earnings press release will be issued at approximately 7:05 a.m. U.S. Eastern Time on Tuesday, May 15.
SSC's management, including Bruno Wu (Executive Chairman & CEO), Bob Benya (President, Director & Chief Revenue Officer), and Jason Wu (Interim CFO), are all scheduled to participate on the earnings call.
Webcast Link: via 'Events & Presentation' section of SSC's corporate website or here:
Earnings Call Website Link
Dial-in Number: (Toll-Free US & Canada): 877-407-3107; (International): 201-493-6796
SSC management encourages investors to email their questions in advance of the webcast/call and time permitting, management will answer the submitted questions. Please email ir@sevenstarscloud.com .
About Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc. ( http://www.sevenstarscloud.com/ )
SSC is aiming to become a next generation Artificial-Intelligent (AI) & Blockchain-Powered, Fintech company. By managing and providing an infrastructure and environment that facilitates the transformation of traditional financial markets such as commodities, currency and credit into the asset digitization era, SSC provides asset owners and holders a seamless method and platform for digital asset securitization and digital currency tokenization and trading.
